Gmail is recommended Get MMS photo Get SMS Refresh photo gallery at opening Refresh MMS gallery Search new MMS in the phone when camera photo gallery opens Gmail instant photo autodownload The feature has been tested with Gmail only. Requires Internet connection always on. For usage of Gmail photos autodownload feature please check the following: 
1. Gmail IMAP access is enabled 
2. Google specific "Access for less secure apps" is turned on 
3. "Data connection" or WiFI at your phone is always on Enable if camera sends MMS photo Enable if camera sends SMS Stop photo searching? Error connecting Email. Please check login and Internet connection. Help Email autodownload is disabled Connection to email imap folder is lost due to network problems.
